dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, can we just talk about Madonna for a second? The Queen, you know, still reigning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, can we just talk about Madonna for a second? The Queen, you know, still reigning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! I mean, it's wild. Back in 1990, Forbes actually put her on the cover, calling her "America's Smartest Business Woman."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! I mean, it's wild. Back in nineteen ninety, Forbes actually put her on the cover, calling her America's Smartest Business Woman.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1990: The year Madonna appeared on the cover of Forbes with the headline America's Smartest Business Woman?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And she's still rolling in it. Forbes said this May her net worth is, like, $590 million. Pretty good, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And she's still rolling in it. Forbes said this May her net worth is, like, five hundred ninety million dollars. Pretty good, huh?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $590 million: Madonnas net worth, as calculated this May by Forbes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty good is an understatement! Though, uh, surprisingly, she was only 36th among America's wealthiest self-made women.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty good is an understatement! Though, uh, surprisingly, she was only thirty sixth among America's wealthiest self-made women.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 36: Her rank among Americas wealthiest self-made women.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Still impressive, though. What really got me, though, is how she's, like, still so relevant. No shows since 2017...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still impressive, though. What really got me, though, is how she's, like, still so relevant. No shows since twenty seventeen...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 0: Number of shows played since the beginning of 2017.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Zero! But she's still getting 1.6 million average daily YouTube views! I mean, *Vogue* alone has 84 million total views.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zero! But she's still getting one point six million average daily YouTube views! I mean, Vogue alone has eighty four million total views.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1.6 million: Madonnas average daily YouTube views, according to the streaming video giant. 84 million: Total views for Vogue on YouTube.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's just... wild. It just shows her enduring power. Two Diamond albums too, *Like a Virgin* and *The Immaculate Collection*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's just... wild. It just shows her enduring power. Two Diamond albums too, Like a Virgin and The Immaculate Collection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2: Number of her albums certified Diamond by the RIAA for moving 10 million-plus units (Like a Virgin and The Immaculate Collection).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Total classics. And, um, speaking of iconic, remember her Manhattan home? Three townhouses mashed together. Nine fireplaces!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Total classics. And, um, speaking of iconic, remember her Manhattan home? Three townhouses mashed together. Nine fireplaces!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3: Number of townhouses mashed together to create Madonnas triple-wide Manhattan home, purchased for $40 million in 2009. 9: Number of fireplaces in the aforementioned townhouse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nine fireplaces! Who even needs nine fireplaces? That's just, like, *extra*. And her acting career, too, 91 credits.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nine fireplaces! Who even needs nine fireplaces? That's just, like, extra. And her acting career, too, ninety one credits.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 91: Acting credits in short films, TV shows and feature films.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and 85 costume changes in one *Evita* performance. That's a serious commitment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and eighty five costume changes in one Evita performance. That's a serious commitment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 85: Total costume changes by Madonna in Evita.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Total commitment! And she's got those 7 Grammys from 28 nominations. A true legend.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Total commitment! And she's got those seven Grammys from twenty eight nominations. A true legend.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 28: Number of Grammy nominations earned by Madonna. 7: Grammy wins by Madonna.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You know what else is wild? That letter from Tupac Shakur? Started at a hundred thousand dollars at auction. Talk about, uh, a valuable past relationship.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know what else is wild? That letter from Tupac Shakur? Started at a hundred thousand dollars at auction. Talk about, uh, a valuable past relationship.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $100,000: Reported starting bid for a letter written by Madonnas onetime love interest Tupac Shakur to the singer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I totally forgot about that! That's insane. But, um, there's also something else here that's pretty wild. The Malawi thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I totally forgot about that! That's insane. But, um, there's also something else here that's pretty wild. The Malawi thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the Malawi thing! Okay, so she raises $7.5 million for a pediatric medical facility there. And they've done, like, 1,690 surgeries since it opened...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the Malawi thing! Okay, so she raises seven point five million dollars for a pediatric medical facility there. And they've done, like, sixteen ninety surgeries since it opened...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $7.5 million: Total raised by Madonna at a 2016 event in Miami to help fund her pediatric medical facility in Malawi. 1,690: Number of pediatric surgeries performed at the aforementioned facility since its opening.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1,690: Number of pediatric surgeries performed at the aforementioned facility since its opening.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! The facility itself has never opened. That just... *how*?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! The facility itself has never opened. That just... how?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1,690: Number of pediatric surgeries performed at the aforementioned facility since its opening.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's a whole other podcast right there, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's a whole other podcast right there, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. But what a career, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. But what a career, right?
